sense.gloss: too, also, in addition, as well, (not) either (in a negative sentence)
both A and B, A as well as B, neither A nor B (in a negative sentence)
even, as much as, as many as, as far as, as long as, no less than, no fewer than
even if, even though, although, in spite of
further, more, again, another, the other

sdata.j: ま|も|なく↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑戻↑↓|も|ど↓って↑来↑↓き↓ます。
すぐ↑戻↑↓|も|ど↓ってきます。
↑何↑↓なん↓と|も|↑言↑↓い↓いようがないなあ。
sdata.e: I just don't know what to say.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑僕↑↓ぼく↓より↑有利↑↓ゆうり↓な↑立場↑↓たちば↓にある|も|のね。
sdata.e: You're in better shape than I am.

sdata.j: すぐに↑諦↑↓あきら↓めて↑昼寝↑↓ひるね↓をするか|も|↑知↑↓し↓れない。
sdata.e: I may give up soon and just nap instead.

sdata.j: みんな|も|そうなのかな、と↑思↑↓お|も|↓うことくらいしかできない。
sdata.e: I can only wonder if this is the same for everyone else.
